## Load Data and Libraries...

library(dplyr)

## Data Wrangling
### Clean up jobs_by_secotr df
```{r}
jobs_by_sector <- melt(jobs_by_sector, variable.name = "Sector")
colnames(jobs_by_sector)[2] <- "Date"
jobs_by_secotr <- spread(jobs_by_sector, Sector, value)
```
